text: The 1902–03 Minnesota Golden Gophers men's basketball team represented the University of Minnesota in intercollegiate basketball during the 1902–03 season. The team finished the season with a 13–0 record and was retroactively named the national champion by the Premo-Porretta Power Poll. ==References== Category:Minnesota Golden Gophers men's basketball seasons Minnesota Category:NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament championship seasons Minnesota Golden Gophers Men's Basketball Team Minnesota Golden Gophers Men's Basketball Team
title: 1902–03 Minnesota Golden Gophers men's basketball team
